conbody.p: XLIFF Manager provides an open source UI for Open XLIFF Filters.
XLIFF Manager lets you create XLIFF 1.2 and 2.0 files that can be translated in any modern CAT tool.
Once your XLIFF files have been translated, you can convert them back to original format with a couple of clicks.
With XLIFF Manager you can validate XLIFF files created by any tool. Validation is supported for XLIFF 1.0, 1.1, 1.2 and 2.0.
XLIFF Manager also lets you produce an HTML file with word counts and segment status statistics from an XLIFF document.
